website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive product recognized for its no-tangle bungee leash for easy pet handling.
pros: Stitching is reflective for nighttime safety
Handle is padded for comfortable grip
Includes a waste bag dispenser and dog training clicker
cons: A few customers wished the leash was longer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome with a big and small dog walking together!
customer_reviews.text: This leash exceeded my expectations! I chose this one based on the reviews and I am so happy. We have a big dog and a little dog. I wanted to walk them together but was concerned the big one would hurt her if he saw a bunny he wanted to lunge towards. Well he tried a couple times, but the bungie leash is phenomenal. And the handle is so comfy with the underlying material that it doesn't hurt my hand. I was waiting for this email to come so I could give my review. Choose this one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Zahorchak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tangle, but difficult to control dogs due to stretchiness
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well for my differently sized dogs (50 pounds and 20 pounds). The small one will sometimes circle the larger one, but the leashes don't tangle. The only problem is that the bungie cords give limited control over the dogs and it's hard to guide them away when they see something they want to pull toward, or when switching directions. My dogs are puppies still and don't walk well, so if your dogs are better on a lease you might have more luck. I do like the product though, just wish there was less elasticity, or another handle lower on the leashes to use as needed.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Parents!
customer_reviews.text: I always felt guilty not being able to take my 2 dogs for a walk with my daughter (in a stroller) because one person could not possibly handle all of that--or so I thought! This leash is great for me to take 2 dogs and a baby for a nice walk. Yes, it takes a little bit of training for my dogs to get used to it, especially since I have one big dog (husky, 110llbs) and a small dog (mini aussie 20lbs). I was worried it wouldn't work with such a size difference of dogs, but it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Good tandem lead with good control
customer_reviews.text: One of my two dogs recently lost his eyesight due to SARDS, and walking him along with my other pup had become pretty difficult as he has become very tentative and cautious and was lagging far behind. Using this lead has helped quite a bit in getting him moving along a little better, as he now needs to keep pace with the other dog. The bungee allows for a decent amount of play between the two when one or the other lags. Working well for me so far
customer_reviews.author: jfr60

customer_reviews.title: and my two large dogs didn't like pulling it to get to their poop and pee ...
customer_reviews.text: The double dog attachment is stretchy but short, and my two large dogs didn't like pulling it to get to their poop and pee spots, so it was actually quite difficult to walk them with the purpose of peeing/pooping. That said, if you have a backyard and your dog does their business there, this would be a good dog walking tool. It just didn't suit my purposes, as I live in an apartment and my dogs have to do their business on our walks.
customer_reviews.author: PiggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great leash! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for the quality of this leash. I have 2 pups they are 1 year old and it's so hard to walk them both. This leash let's them cross cross as many times as they like and not tangled mess.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer girl Kona

customer_reviews.title: This leash is FANTASTIC! I have a 70 lb dog and a ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash is FANTASTIC! I have a 70 lb dog and a 26 lb dog, and they can now walk together without problem. The stretchy part of the leash makes a huge difference in absorbing the shock from sudden moves. The handle part is quite comfortable. This leash has made walking the dogs so much easier. I was a little worried about how it would work with a big dog and a medium dog on the same leash, but it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: CWilli00

customer_reviews.title: Great for mixed temperaments
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash so much! We have a standard chihuahua and a mini dachshund. The chihuahua is so dainty and light-footed, while the dachshund is a beefy bully who loves to pull. We tried a different tandem leash and had pretty miserable results, with the chihuahua yanked all over creation and unable to do her business in peace. Not so anymore; this leash lets the dachshund pull until he’s flat on the ground while still giving slack to my poor chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No More Dogs Tripping Each Other
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to my two pit bulls yanking on it, and they weigh 53 and 40 lbs and are chunks of muscle. Way better than them getting all tangled up when we walk together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a godsend for my rambunctious dogs
customer_reviews.text: Have two rescue mutts that are difficult to handle on two different leashes. But this system with the Y split leash and bungie cord action, makes for a smooth dog walking experience. Before if they tried to go in separate directions, they would nearly pull my arms out of socket and treat my like a wishbone. Now, the bungie action absorbs most of the jerkiness and they walk together more in tandem. My arms, hands and wrists aren't hurting after a walk now. Not to mention I only have one leash to hold on to so I have a free hand to carry a drink or get mail from the mailbox, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Toto de Tejas

customer_reviews.title: Gentle tightening of lead without yanking, and no more tangled leads!!
customer_reviews.text: Dual bungee leash is a welcomed relief for dual dog walking! I have two smaller sized dogs that I care for and they love to go from side to side, on individual leashes I’d have a tangled mess by the end of walk. With this leash, no more tangles! I strongly believe in the bungee, even for the largest of dog, the bungee makes controlling them so much easier! It can tug them back gently! They feel the gradual tightening of the lead before it is fully extended! What more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: RoOR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Plenty of space between you and the split and between both dogs. You can easily grab the t area as well if you need to bring them closer in tight areas or crowded places. If you pay attention then your two dogs won't get tangled up ever. The swivel does an excellent job. The bungee pull makes it easy to tug back lightly to refocus or help a pup stop pulling without a cruel full jerk to the neck. If you are too busy on your phone though you earn the tangle mess that even the bungee notifies you is about to happen. Dogs sniff and go different directions.
customer_reviews.author: MSternberg001

customer_reviews.title: Great leash, durable, doesn’t work for my two dogs (small & large breed)
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I use it on the same dog! I have a puller, and he has been known to slide out of his harness. I use this to secure him from the color and also from the harness. This has corrected him trying to slide out of it.. he knows he will still be stuck so a year later and no issues or new attempts with him sliding out of the harness.. this holds my dog so I know it’s sturdy!!! Tested and true lol Side note.. I will say this didn’t work with my small Chihuahua and my big Anatolian Shepherd. Big dog drug small dog everywhere they never learned to walk together.. lol
customer_reviews.author: James Nale

customer_reviews.title: Good way to walk 2 dogs with different personalities
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash a lot. I have a dog that is young and walks well but my other dog is older and has always been skittish. He does great on his own in the yard but he always been terrible on a leash. He acts like he’s scared to go anywhere and he’s either digging his heels in refusing to move or pulling so had he rips your arm off. This leash semi-forces him to walk with the more confident dog—not perfect but much better. I think with consistent use he will continue to improve. The leash is sturdy. It does not tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Jo VM

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this leash, better than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash, I really doubted it would do the job, but it exceeded my expectations. I have 2 small dogs and I love the bungee cord which helps one dog to go a little faster. The bungee cord is only about 12 to 18" long but just enough to help. I also love the swivel hooks on each of the cords, because I have a puppy that goes all over the place and she can go in circles and crosses in front of the other dog which she does all the time. II have recommended it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Used for a medium and small dog duo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution for two dogs. They do not get tangled thanks to the rotating clip rings, and it's no problem for our tall, medium sized dog alongside our short dachshund mix. The clips needed some WD-40 after being exposed to salty beach air recently, but it fixed it right up. I might replace the clips with carabiners since the leash cord and the rings are, in contrast, great quality. You can also turn this into a single, long leash by unclipping one of the short dog leashes and clipping it between the handle leash and the other short dog leash section.
customer_reviews.author: frqntAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Get two dogs to head in generally the same direction
customer_reviews.text: The Dual Dog Leash works better than I had anticipated. It makes both dogs go in somewhat the same direction or else they are struggling against each other instead of you. It looks to be very well built & the bungee eliminates any shock from running to the end of the leash. The dogs had just gotten to the end of a long walk when it was delivered & I hooked them up to it. One was ready to go & the other was laying down getting dragged along over the grass but still happy as a lark. They are both puppies so this behavior isn't new. I would recommend trying it if you regularly walk two dogs at once.
customer_reviews.author: Skeet

customer_reviews.title: Looove
customer_reviews.text: I not only love the dual leash but the leash part is awesome too. The little padding in the handle feels so nice. It's great with the bungie even with a smaller and bigger dog cause they can have one stop to go bathroom and the 2nd dog doesn't yank the other from going. I am so impressed with this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. No more tangled leashes! The bungie works perfectly it prevents sudden tugging and helps the dogs keep up with each other.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the right two dogs
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Sturdy, with nice reflective stripes. The elasticity is nice though it may have too much give at times. The main consideration to pass along is to make sure it makes sense for your two dogs. If they are of different size, strength or temperament, the smaller of the two may get taken for a drag at times. I can see this being perfect for two mature dogs who go for low-key walks or runs and don't do a lot of darting around.
customer_reviews.author: ctinva

customer_reviews.title: No more tangles...until you get caught on the wrong side of the "Y"
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash so far because my dogs can wander to the other side of the sidewalk without me having to constantly detangle their leashes from each other. 2 main cons: 1) if one of the dogs walks behind you then the leash can trap you in 2) You have less pull on the dogs because of the bungee cord. They have to be far enough away for a pull to be effective (say, to get them out of the way from a crowd or another dog, etc) Overall really happy with this product and highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Magmar1994

customer_reviews.title: A must have when walking two dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Walking two dogs with their own separate leashes is a pain in the booty. The leashes get tangles, the dogs get tangled, you get tangled. With this, I can walk my boxer and great dane mix at the same time without any of that mess! I love this leash! As you can see in the pictures, the dogs like to switch sides often and the little swivel at the end of the leash you holds keeps the two branches from getting tangled unlike two separate leashes. This has made my life SO much easier in terms of walking the pups.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I was very skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would actually work and that it would be strong enough. However, I was wrong on both counts. I have an 80lb lab and a 50lb Black Mouth Cur, they really pull and the leash can take it. Both dogs can walk at different speeds but if one is really pulling, then the other one has to follow him/her. This isn't really a problem except if one of he dogs is going to the bathroom and the other is pulling really hard.......the other one has to stop going to the bathroom. lol. Other than that problem, I really love this leash and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rhorer

customer_reviews.title: Not for pullers
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a little over a year. One of my dogs has a habit of grabbing the leash, so eventually it was torn and frayed. I replaced the leash first. The dual part had enough distance for two medium-sized dogs, about 35-45 lbs. each, but they pull, so the strain eventually ripped it and I was worried that it would break and the dogs would get loose. I used this product several times a day. It's a good product, but probably for smaller dogs or dogs that don't pull. The reason for 3 stars is durability because the whole thing had to be replaced after a little over a year for medium-sized dogs who pull.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mo

customer_reviews.title: Comes with extra stuff outside the leash splitter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just for the leash splitter really and I honestly didn't realize it came with all the bells and whistles. I was pleasantly surprised to see that it includes a leash, dog waste bags, and a trainer button. So if you're like me and you didn't see that. Now you know. With that being said. All the items are fairly well made and sturdy. The leash splitter itself is such a good idea when you have two dogs! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jlshapiro89

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like to go off in different directs and when walking two pups everyone knows this is a bit annoying with this leash I don't have to worry about that and it feels sturdy and lets them wander but not too far away from each other. It also feels good in my hands so if they pull which happens when a squirrel is around my hand doesn't hurt. I've been using it consistently since I bought it and its held up wonderfully. Great product would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: works great with my two dogs
customer_reviews.text: I used this while walking my dogs this weekend at the camp grounds. The leash was very sturdy. My dogs learned what their limits were quickly. They didn't get tangled like they used to with regular leashes. I plan to buy another leash for my other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: BeagleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy & seems well-made, but quite heavy for my 2 small dogs (shih tzu mixes). The dual leash would stretch out quite a bit as they ran ahead, and then when it slacked again as they slowed or stopped, the contracting loop would about knock them down as it struck their backs. Might be just the thing for large strong dogs, but I returned it in favor of a smaller lighter product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this for one dog. We hook it up to his collar and harness. Works great for him! It helps us keep control of him at all times. In case he pops out of his collar (escape artist), then at least we will still have good hold of him at his harness. My husband had been walking our big boy with two leashes. He was amazed when I showed him the dual leash and even more amazed that he could easily walk our dog. We 100% recommend this dual leash for people who need good control over there big dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but was not to be. The bungee is really stretchy, so every movement made both dogs bounce all over the place, and the bag holder jumped right off. Basically, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: If you have 2 dogs, this is a must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my arms going in every direction when I walk my 2 puppies. I only use this leash when I go on walks not for quick potty trips outside (I live in an apartment). I have one fast "walker" and one kind of on the slow side and this allow one dog to set the pace and makes my other dog keep up. The clicker and poop bag carrier is a added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be Equal
customer_reviews.text: This leash seems to be well made. The only caveat to dog owners out there is that if you have two dogs that walk at different paces, this leash won't work for you. We have an older dog and one very energetic puppy. The puppy pulls ahead, while the older dog is kind of dragging (and his harness is pulled almost over his head. LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Camie

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this leash. If I could improve it at all I'd want the couplings to be longer so the dogs could walk farther apart. I see I can purchase extenders for a leash on Amazon so I will probably do that. My dogs are under 50lbs each so I don't have any issues with feeling as if they are out of control. They aren't typical pullers on a leash so that probably does help. I've not had any tangle issues so far either. Overall I'm pleased and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad dual leash. Used it twice already. Pretty easy, but I like my extended leash that I have already. So I took off the one that was attached to the door leash. Really like it so that way it gives them a little bit more of an extended walk. The only problem I see with and without the regular leashed attach is the fact that if it gets behind the dog and under the tail you have to pull it up. Other than that is great. Would definitely buy again, and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Riggs

customer_reviews.title: My life is better with this leash set up!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Golden Retrievers, one is 9 years and the other 8 months. Walking them with 2 leashes was like a circus act. This leash allows the older dog to walk at his pace and the puppy to be gently tugged when needed. They no longer get tangled, trip me or turn me into a contortionist as I try to untangle the 3 of us and 2 leashes.
customer_reviews.author: yay me

customer_reviews.title: Not for drastically different sized dogs together
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product and does what it says, but it’s not for a big (75lb) and small dog (15lb) that is able to be pulled by the bigger dog so easily, I just tried it out and it doesn’t tangle or anything but my smaller dog jumped up a little bit and the bigger dog was walking on and all of a sudden pulled the little dog unintentionally and my smaller dog literally back slammed right on the concrete street and whimpered for a little bit. I love the concept of the leash and it’s a good product, just not for drastically different sized dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam n

customer_reviews.title: Good Product :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 large, stubborn Siberian Huskies. It works well when I am trying to transfer them from home to car or to the park or store. But doesn't work well for daily walks/potty time. Its not long enough to allow them to have any privacy so I end up having to take them out on separate leashes but I do love it for just transporting them places. I would def recommend this product. The quality is outstanding and you cant beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyblaze77

customer_reviews.title: Leash pivots and allows range of movement for both dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two Alaskan Malamutes and was skeptical as to whether this leash would hold them. Not only does it provide a secure grip and sturdy connection to their harnesses, the leash provides a range of movement that gives them a little leeway while keeping them close enough to manage. They are able to switch places with no entanglement as the leash has the ability to pivot nicely. Our dogs are large, but this leash is perfect for them as it is easy to maneuver and our Malamutes have the ability to walk without the leash restricting their movement. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this leash. I now have two springer spaniels and I was trying to figure out how I would even walk two dogs at the same time. I did some research online about keeping two dogs untangled on separate leashes, and an ad for this leash popped up (cue the song... I always feel like somebody's watching me). I am so glad I gave this a go! We had our inaugural walk today on the trail and it went perfect! They could zig zag to their heart's content and I was happily untangled. If you have two dogs, and you don't have this leash...you are not living your best life!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany K.

customer_reviews.title: Can finally walk all dogs at once!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pugs-all different sizes and ages. Trying to walk them on conventional leashes was a nightmare, if not impossible. I had actually given up on walking them until I came across this leash. I looked at several different brands but chose this one because of the "bungee" feature. This allows 1 dog to pull in a different direction without pulling the other dog. I bought 2 of these leashes-2 dogs in one hand and 2 in the other. VERY pleased with these leashes and the pugs are happy they can ALL go for a walk at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A McKey

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This leash was very helpful. My Yorkie is very active and likes to pull on the leash. My rescue dog is calm. Walking the two of them on separate leashes was a hectic. This leash allowed me to manage just one and forced the pups to coordinate. I wish there was a longer version. But other than that the leash has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: LexiLikesLiterature

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice leash, works well for our pups, but I wouldn't recommend it for smaller dogs, as it'd be too heavy. I do wish the non-stretchy part was a bit longer & the handle a bit narrower - it seems to be made for big hands & I don't even have small lady hands. But overall, it works well. They don't get tangled & they have enough space to smell their own areas of interest.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina K

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hated walking my dogs together because of how tangled they’d get and their different paces. Someone recommended this to me and I LOVE it. I have a Newfoundland and Bernese mix and this saves me when walking them. Makes it a breeze. Only bad thing is sometimes they’ll pull each other when the other is going potty but that’s a dog problem we’ll get figured out! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more twisting and tangling
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash! It's sturdy and well designed to allow both of our puppies to cross paths without hassles. I no longer have to walk turning full circles every so many steps. I bit more give on the elastic would help so that each dog can wander a bit further away from the other. Great product. The poop bag holder included comes in quite handy. We've used for about a month now and it looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Malemar

customer_reviews.title: No tangling! Ok for different size dogs.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m thrilled with this leash. I don’t always have two dogs to walk, but when I do, from now on, I’m using this dual leash. It doesn’t get tangled. The two dogs I’m walking are different sizes, but with the bungy portion of the leashes, there’s enough give to accommodate that. I would recommend using a harness collar, as the dogs can pull on each other and cause some neck/throat stress.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be walking two chihuahuas. I didn’t expect for it to be so nice for the price. It appears to be extremely durable. I’d definitely use it with multi sized dogs. Stitching is strong and the bungee part will definitely help me not being pulled every which way. They are little but two different leashes is a lot of work. This will definitely help.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Not for pullers or small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Product idea seems alright but I don’t like it personally. It is supposed to help with the shock on the dog’s neck if they pull, but for my Great Dane who is 145 lbs, it made it easier for him to pull. So I tried it on my 5lb and 15 lb dogs and it choked them like flung them back if they tried to pull which isn’t very safe because they would land right in front of my feet and almost tripped me. Maybe for non pullers, but not small dogs or ones who pull.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Much better than juggling two flexi leashes
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have a 22 pound beast who pulls constantly and a heeler puppy who walks nicely. They sort of balance each other out on this. I have carpal tunnel and the leash is easy enough to hold and very sturdy. The spring in the leash allows for my small dog to pull and not choke my puppy. The only annoying thing about a coupler is when they split around your legs and/or slingshot your 2 year old to the ground. I can walk 2 dogs and an angry 2 year old together with this though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This leash is amazing! I have a Husky and A Pitty-bull springer spaniel mix. Both dogs are high energy. This allows them to both be independent and if one tries to bolt the bungee leash gives them a correction for you. The dogs do not get tangled anymore. The grip on the lead part is soft and comfortable for your hand if the dogs pull. If you want easier walks, comfortable walks and less stress I would buy this leash! The extras are also great for training.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Aube III

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality Double Leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash has made my life so much easier! I have 2 dogs & their leashes were always getting tangled, or they’d pull & I’d accidentally drop one of their leashes. Now they walk together hassle free. It’s also nice and sturdy, which is important because we walk near some busy roads.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this sooner. My 2 dogs are difficult to walk without getting me tangled up with them. First time I used this was wonderful. One dog is 14 and the other 9 months. Because of the bungy, I am able to hold back the pup without interfering with the older dog.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Boston terrier puppies. 6 months and 8 months old. Before getting this, taking them for a walk with separate leashes was a disaster. Tangled up constantly. They both like walking now with this. They both chew on it when they can and so far haven't done any damage. It makes walking the dogs enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: The leash works great! I have two German Shepherd dogs (about 65 lbs each) and they handle this leash very well. The quality is great and I don’t feel like they are going to rip it apart like I do with cheaper types of leashes. They never tangle up with each other even when they are zig zagging everywhere. The stretch of the leash is also good because they are able to walk far apart from each other if they chose to. Overall love this leash! It makes walking two dogs so much easier. I also love that it came with doggie bags and a clicker!
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Two dog lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This leash is a life saver. I have two small dogs and they would tangle themselves and pull me in two directions while we went on walks. This keeps them in line and walk together without getting tangled. The only mild complaint that I have is that the leash is a bit heavy for the smaller dogs but we’ve adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Dambyrds

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This leash is decently made. It feels light & nice in hand, and I do agree with many reviewers that it does not get tangled too often. Overall, I would say that it is worth the value ONLY if you have smaller/well-behaved dogs... I would not recommend if you have larger dogs, or even medium-sized dogs that like to pull. We purchased ours in Feb of 2019; it has just broken in 2 separate parts of the leash in April of 2020. While lasting over a year has slightly exceeded my expectations, I will definitely be purchasing a different, sturdier leash for my 90lb dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Hults

customer_reviews.title: Amazing leash for two labradors
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved my life. I’ve used other splitter before, but the swivel is the key here. I have two giant Labrador’s who LOVE their walks, but are very strong. This has helped distribute their pulling. They both walk SO MUCH better on this thing. The leash handle is strong enough to tolerate them as well as has not fallen apart with heavy usage. The extras gifts that came with it were also a plus. I will never order another leash again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best double dog leash I’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: Best double dog leash I’ve had and my pups are 14 and 13 years old! The bungy cord type leash between the dogs allows them more flexibility and comfort than the traditional style leash. The padded handle strap makes a noticeable difference as well. The reflective stitching makes it seem as though the designers of this leash truly thought of everything. Highly recommend and have already shared the link with others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much easier when two are involved.
customer_reviews.text: Nice dual leash system. Works well with my mini schnauzers. Enough room to spread out but keeps them close enough to manage and better than two separate leashes. Love the elastic lower section providing some give when one decides to head opposite the other. It's also forgiving on the handler absorbing some of the tug from excited pups.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Handles both dogs just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my 60# and 30# pups, who are quite rambunctious. It handles their 90lb combined weight with no issues. It is much easier to keep the dogs from getting tangled together than I thought it would be, because they use the right connectors in the right places. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Use for small dogs. Disaster for large not well behaved ones.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great if you have dogs that will cooperate. I have 2 large boxers and It was a disaster. They kept getting intertwined. At one point they went behind me and almost took my legs out from under me. Gifted to my mother who has chihuahuas . Would work better for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: You should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention. We have 2 small doxies and figured this would be hands down the answer to our leash battle. Unfortunately, our dogs like to do acrobatics while on the leash, and one thinks he is leading the sled dog team, so it becomes a sling shot for the both of them. This will NOT become tangled. If you have dogs who are decent at walking on a leash, and don’t compete like they’re in the olympics, then this is the leash for you. I am going to hang on to this and try again once they get a little older. Definitely a must!
customer_reviews.author: iceberg

customer_reviews.title: Durable and no tangle
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. I use it for my 2 chihuahuas and it's become so much easier to walk them together. It doesnt tangle and it's super durable. The handle loop also has a cushion for your hands which is great
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of using this, I’m finally writing a review! I have a very large, strong pit mixed with something bigger and then a younger, more energetic, and equally as strong pit and the two of them together have not broken this leash so far, so I’m giving it 5 starts all the way around!!
customer_reviews.author: For Women Everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I got a second german shepherd. The only thing I didn't account for was the stretch in the double leash. If you're trying to leash train a dog it's kind of pointless with this. I use a prong collar and and when I'm trying to direct her a certain way I have to pull more to get her attention.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I already have a dog and had a foster dog coming in. It arrived on time and is working out perfectly. As soon as I starting walking them it’s like they knew exactly what to do. I am pleased. And it’s nice that it can with a poop bag holder, a poop bag and a clicker. I am very pleased to say the least !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for big and small dog
customer_reviews.text: This has really been a life saver when walking my large and small dog. The leash never tangoes and doesn’t make the dogs walk too close together. It is made of a sort of bungee material, so the large dog can naturally pull the small dog around sometimes but I think this is just because my large dog is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Erryn Leavell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT for 2 dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LIFE SAVER! If you have two dogs and take them on runs/walks - you NEED this product! I’m in love. I did switch the actual leash part out for a longer leash that I had, but the bungees are amazing and my dogs don’t get tangled at all! I have two Australian Shepherds and they walk and run soooo well on this leash!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best. Thing. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This leash solved the issues I had with walking my 2 dogs. One dog is 77lbs and the other is 31lbs. They are very strong, especially together! The leash made the impact of the dogs much less forceful and kept me on my feet. It also eliminated the constant tangling I often endure when walking. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this lease, unfortunately it is not that durable. We have a new puppy and an older dog. One of the springs broke. With a new puppy, we knew that there would be some pulling in the beginning as we trained her to walk. I would recommend perhaps for dogs that are well trained in walking together(no pulling or tugging). Our dogs are not big (18lbs and 25lbs).
customer_reviews.author: T.H. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Energetic dogs may get tangled
customer_reviews.text: We really like this leash, except for when our dogs get distracted and run opposite ways leaving us tangled. The elastic in it makes it lower impact when our dogs get excited and try to run off, but they also have managed to tangle themselves in it. It's better than holding two leashes with energetic puppies, but probably works best with well behaved dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash
customer_reviews.text: This leash was life changing. I have a 6 month old and an 8 year old both German Shepherds. One is out of control and the older one is trained and well behaved. The leash works perfectly for both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING LEASH
customer_reviews.text: I regret I am returning this-Not because there’s a problem with it. Thought it was what I needed for my 2 dogs but discovered it wouldn’t work with my crazy dogs. This looks well made & would be great for well behaved dogs. The shipment arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my two small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a puppy in April 2020 and I found using two separate leashes were challenging. I saw this on a Daily Deal and decided to purchase it after reading the reviews. This leash is great for my two small dogs (schnauzer mix and terrier mix). They tend to cross each other as I am walking and this leash handles that very nicely. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Mama

customer_reviews.title: Cheap spring clips. Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: One star because the leash as delivered is unusable. One of the hooks that attach to the dog collar does not work. The spring is broken. The other hook seems to work but feels cheap and like it will break after one or two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Its so nice to walk them together! Having 2 leashes, the dogs would spread out and our 6mo old pup would always try to walk ahead of everyone. This makes them walk together and helps to train him to wall more like the older dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Clever device for handling two dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs: One is a peach and very sedate, the other we call "The Weasel" because she is like the honey badger but her name is Liesel. Can be challenging to handle two dogs of different temperaments at the same time but if your dogs are similar in behavior this should work well.Wish I had had this leash when one of our dogs saw a skunk and tore the leash I was trying to manage out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: inland sailor

customer_reviews.title: No longer tangled up
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect leash to walk my dogs. I have a dog that weight 55 lbs and the other weighs 14 lbs. Their leashes would always get tangled when we walked and at times the leashes would circle around me and I could not move. This leash allows the dogs to go in front and also to weave between each other taking turns on the inside and outside. It is very secure and I can hold tight when they see a cat or squirrel. This leash is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Fun in the Sun

customer_reviews.title: But for larger dogs I think this would be an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: It is very durable. The swivels work well for the most part. I have a 25 lb border collie and a Yorkie and it didn't work out for us it's just too heavy duty. Border collie yanked little one all around bungee Style. But for larger dogs I think this would be an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeAllyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good use for  two dogs but not great
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, I liked having control over my dogs and still having a free hand. My dogs where able to walk and crisscross each other without being tangled up. The only issue is my dogs could not wonder in different areas, they could only go in the direction the other dog with more pull was going. I found that my dogs then started having space issues where they would not potty if the other dog was in their space. I went back to my old leash for when they potty and only use this on long walks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this leash for one month and the stretch on one side already broke. My dog is only 40 pounds and the elastic inside snapped this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Arnold

customer_reviews.title: BEST LEASH FOR PULLING DOG
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing! I got this, and a harness that has a front and back clip, and I just use it for one dog. She has a really hard time walking and not pulling while we walk. The first time I used it it stopped her from pulling and makes our walks pain free (to my hands, haha) I am truly thankful for this product!! Seriously recommend for anyone that has a dog who loves to pull!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Weatherby

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: I have two German shepherds about 4 months the leash is great to walk them with leash but if my wife or daughters walk our boys they will pull wife and daughters down the steps so if the leash was a little longer it would work better
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer! I wish I would have discovered this sooner. So easy and stress free to walk my two dogs. Before I bought this I wanted to rip my hair out walking them. They would tangle and one would go one way and the other would go another way ahhh!!! This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Lwag

customer_reviews.title: Quality with bonuses!
customer_reviews.text: We just adopted our two pups and kept getting tangled up with our retractable leashes. This leash is perfect. No more tangles! Our dogs are very bonded so are really in sink while they walk other than crossing each other so this leash does the trick. Great product. Quality was very impressive. Also, I have been using the training clicker a lot. No more random barking!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great leash system
customer_reviews.text: SO WORTH IT! This is the best split lease system I have used. We have a puppy and much older dog and I was able to walk them both comfortably and best of all the puppy jumping all over didn't bother our older dog. Also came with a free clicker which works wonders and a bonus poop bag holder. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LiRo

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two dogs, one a labradoodle puppy and the other a westie. The westie walks well but the puppy is all over the place. This however helped a lot to keep both of them in control with one hand. It does have a swivel and never once got tangled up. Its very sturdy with bungies at the two end parts.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Walking my two chocolate labs on separate leashes was chaotic to say the least. They are always switching sides and getting tangled. This leash system holds up very well and makes walking so much easier (70lbs and 80lbs but still growing). I really like the integrated bungee tethers and the ring swivel to keep them from tangling.
customer_reviews.author: MES

customer_reviews.title: Good but might take some practice.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't tangle. But make sure to keep dogs in front of you. May take some practice for both you and your dogs. My dogs were not used to walking together and they would pull each other in different directions. the only problem is when one goes in front of you and one goes behind you on your other side, You get stuck in the middle...we practiced a few times and they got the hang of it!
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash! I have been looking for one that would suit my golden retriever and miniature Australian Shepard and this is fantastic. I love that the split leashes are “bungee” which allows the larger dog to pull when she sees something interesting without taking the little guy for a ride 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Bought this less than 6 months ago. I don't even walk my dogs as much as I should, probably once a week. Today I was walking and my dog got excited after seeing a squirrel and the clasp popped right out of the leash. Luckily it was an early morning walk and no vehicles were around, but it is still very concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Poor for small dogs... gets tangled under their legs when they aren't pulling because the leads are too heavy and long. Disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more tangles!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is fantastic if you’re tired of being wrapped up like a Christmas ham by your dogs. If I could change one thing, I’d have an additional handle where the leash splits, for instances I need the dogs to stay close. But other than that, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G

customer_reviews.title: Free hands and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. I use it while walking with my baby girl in the stroller and my two different sized dogs hooked to this leash and a carbine to my belt. Works like a charm people taking photos of me. Everybody has a smart-ass comment about "having your arms full". Is this undergone some abuse over the last few months. It looks a little bit less pretty than the in the beginning, but does the job perfectly. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Giterman

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product!!! I’m a dog boarder, so I commonly have multiple dogs of varying sizes. This leash makes walking them so much easier. There is a lot less tension on my hand while I hold it. I would recommend if you have any dogs that like to lunge at other dogs walking by to hold it by the center ring. Other than that, it’s a great product and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best dual dog leash
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been saving my bacon. We just got a second dog and I had been taking them on walks on separate leashes and boy howdy was that a disaster. We would get tangled up every which way and I vowed never to venture out alone with them again. Until we got this dual dog leash. Walking my dogs is easy peasy lemon sqeezy now. They can walk in and around each other without getting tangled, and I only have to hold one leash. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have two 9 year old cockapoos that act like puppies. Lots of energy. We love this double leash. Strong. Has some elastic to “give” when the dog pulls on it (or I do). The dogs automatically seemed to know how to use it (via being on one leash). Far superior to using two separate leashes during walks.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Springs Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars All-Around!
customer_reviews.text: I have two 75lb dogs that I use this for and this is the BEST tandem leash I've ever had! I love that each lead stretches a little, so they can walk at their own pace. I also love the comfy handle. It's really durable and the construction is high quality. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elledog10

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great dog leash! I have two medium sized dogs and this worked out well. The leash is heavy duty with reflective pattern up and down it. When my dogs cross over the leash does not twist. I can now have one hand free when walking two dogs. Bonus was a poop bag holder and dog clicker. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish all items worked this well
customer_reviews.text: First... i need to add a picture but if you own dogs, you know they are worse than children with pictures! This leash is fantastic, we have a new addition to the family who has been tangling his poor sister up during walks making it impossible to walk them at the same time. This leash has been a god send and i highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro L.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs a golden retriever puppy who’s 30 lbs right now and a black lab German short haired pointer who’s 75 lbs and this works perfect. They cannot really pull and it doesn’t tangle
customer_reviews.author: Kayle

product_meta.title: Dual Dog Leash,Double Dog Leash,360°Swivel No Tangle Double Dog Walking & Training Leash,Comfortable Shock Absorbing Reflective Bungee for Two Dogs with waste bag dispenser and dog training clicker
feature_bullets: [ SUITABLE FOR MEDIUM & LARGE DOGS ] --- (57.87" length x 0.98" width) You can walk and control 2 dogs at once while maintaining safe control over both! Free up one of your hands and control both dogs.We also have fashionable waste bag dispenser and dog training clicker.

[ NO TANGLE ] --- Enjoy the peace of mind with our tangle-free 360° swivel leash attachment. You will never have to worry about getting twisted leashes while walking 2 dogs, allowing your dogs to move freely around you.

[ SHOCK ABSORBING BUNGEE LEASH ] --- Unique Bungee Design helps to absorb shock of quick movement when used with energetic and active dogs, reduce the feeling of being pulled. The length of the bungee can be extended from 20 to 35 inch with strong pulling force, which give your dogs enough room to run in front of you or beside you.

[ REFLECTIVE STITCHING ] --- Benefit extra safety at night with the luminous reflective stitching that spans the length of both leashes. Our stylish reflective seams are a must to help you stand out in the dark and an essential for you and your dogs' safety

[ COMFORTABLE PADDED HANDLE ] ---No more burned hands with the soft padded handle.Soft neoprene padded handle brings ultimate comfort and let you free up one hand while walking 2 dogs,it's able to endure 0-100 lbs pull.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
